segments.text: I take in the details of this indoor kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The counter and sink line the right wall nicely.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Woman stands there, apron on, tending to dishes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But the faucet's running wild, causing an overflow.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water floods out, drenching cabinets and creating a mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She hasn't a clue, foot submerged in the growing puddle.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: To the side, open cabinets hold the tempting cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Boy balances on the tilting two-step stool, hand inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Girl waits patiently, her palm up for a treat.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This sneaky operation could end in tears.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The outside through the window is all order and green.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel disgusted by the needless water waste.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And angry at the ignored dangers all around.
segments.speaker: PAR
